text: "Another Lonely Night in New York" is a 1983 song by singer Robin Gibb and is the second single from his second studio album How Old Are You?. It went to number 71 in the United Kingdom and was a big hit in Europe where it went to #19 in Switzerland and #16 in Germany. It was never released as a single in the United States or Canada. == References == Category:1983 songs Category:Robin Gibb songs
title: Another Lonely Night in New York
